title: What are the best Hindi romantic songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Out of hundreds of beautiful romantic songs from our Hindi cinema, only a handful are given here---- 1. Kuhu kuhu bole koyaliya... 2. Mohe na bula....both from Suvarna Sundari--Lata-Rafi, Lata, 3. Ye raat bhingi bhingi... 4. Aa ja sanam madhur chandani men hum... 5. Jahan main jaati hun.....all three from Chori-Chori--Lata, Manna De, 6. Main piya Teri tu mane ya na mane....Basant Bahar--Lata, Manna De, 7. Pyar hua iqrar hua hai....Shri 420,--Lata, Manna De, 8. Pass baitho tabiyat bahal jayegi---Punarmilan--Rafi, 9. Hum bekhudi men tumko pukare chale gaye---Kala Pani, Rafi, 10. Zindagi bhar nahin bhulegi wo barsat ki raat---Barsat ki Raat--Rafi, 11. Aaiye meharbaan---Howrah Bridge---Asha, 12. Ye hai reshmi zulfon ka andhera---Mere Sanam---Asha, 13. Tu kahan ye bata is nashili rast men---Tere ghar ke saamne---Rafi, 14. Jalte hain jiske liye----Sujata--Talat, 15. Chand aahen bharega---Phool bane angare---Mukesh, 16. Tum ko mil gaye ho to ye lagta hai---Hanste zakhma--Rafi, 17. Beqarar karke hamen yun na jayie---Bees sal baad--Hemant Kumar, 18. Na bole tum na Maine kuchh kaha---Baaton baaton men--Amit Kumar, Lata, 19. Hai Kali Kali ke lab par---Lalarukh--Rafi, 20. Ye hawa ye raat ye chandni---Sangdil--Talat, 21. Kitna hasin hai mausam---Azad--Lata, Chitalkar, 22. Saiyan jhoothon ka bada sartaz nikla---Do aankhen barah hath--Lata, 23. O sajna barkha bahar aayi--Parakh--Lata, 24. Zulmi sang aankh ladi---Madhumati---Lata, 25. Ye hasin wadiya ye khula asman---Roza--SP Balasubramanyam, Chitra, 26. Ye raaten ye mausam nadi ka kinara--Dilli ka Thug--Kishor, Asha, 27. Deewana mastana hua dil--Bombai ka Babu--Asha, Rafi, 28. Aa ja re pardesi--Madhumati--Lata, 29. Mehtab tera chehra--Ashiq--Mukesh, Lata, 30. Hai apna dil to awara--Solwan Saa--Hemant Kumar….etc.

Mere rang mein rangnewali Aate jaate Muskuraane Galliyan Aashiqui 1 and 2 albums Bahara I love you Tujh mein rab dikhta hain Baahon mein chale aao Lag ja gale Samjhawan Mast magan Tere bin nahin lage jiya Gerua Main hoon hero tera Kuch kuch hota hain Tujhe dekha toh Masakali Daayein baayein Tera zikr Jeene de Moh moh ke dhaage Khuda jaane Ishq wala love Churake dil mera Abhi na jaao chod kar Pani da rang Yeh raatein yeh mausam Hum tum Gulabi Thode badmaash Jab se tere naina Tu hi rab tu hi dua Jashn e bahara In lamhon ke daaman mein Suno na sangemarmar Love is a waste of time Zoobi doobi Subhanallah Piya o re piya Dholna Bheeni bheeni mehki mehki Bholi si soorat Dekha ek khwaab Churaliya hain
